Updates.Title: Update 1.00.0
Updates: Grow a Garden is first released

Updates.Title: Update 1.01.0
Updates: New bamboo, cactus, mango, peach, pineapple and rasberry crops are added
New rain and lightning weathers are added
New daily quest and gear shop stands are added
New basic sprinkler, advanced sprinkler, godly sprinkler and seed pack items are added
You can now hold E on a keyboard or the harvest button on mobile to harvest crops
You can now right click on a keyboard or tap and hold on mobile to favourite to favourite crops. These items wont be sold when uou sell all.
For every friend that is in your game you get 10% more money
You can now hover over a crop to see the % of its growth
When using the shovel item, the crop that is going to be removed is now highlighted
Some fixes to try and prevent duping have been added

Updates.Title: Update 1.01.1
Updates: Some bug fixes / minor changes are added

Updates.Title: Update 1.01.2
Updates: Some bug fixes / minor changes are added

Updates.Title: Update 1.02.0
Updates: An NPC named Poppy is added, including an exclusive quest
New exclusive Easter items are added, including the candy blossom, chocolate sprinkler, easter egg, candy sunflower, red lollipop and chocolate carrot
New grape, cursed fruit, soul fruit, passionfruit, banana, papaya, daffodil and orange tulip crops are added
The new choc mutation is added, given to crops when they are in the range of a chocolate sprinkler
New exotic seed pack and master sprinkler items are added
Autocollect is now much more efficient on PC and mobile, with cleaner UI and sounds
New gold texture added
New badges added
Major improvements to Grow a Garden on console
Added gifting to other players
Revamped much UI
New confirm prompt for when you remove crops
New shop added
Some data issues fixed
You can now hover over on PC or tap and hold on mobile on a sprinkler to see its range and remaining time
Notifications are improved
Fixed visuals on some crops
Fixed some duplicating issues
Fixed a bug where crops are too large to harvest
The peach and rasberry base prices are increased
Fixed some issues with crop selling
Various changes made to sprinklers
Improvements on the gift feature

Updates.Title: Update 1.02.1
Updates: Some bug fixes / minor changes are added

Updates.Title: Update 1.03.0
Updates: A new angry plant implemented - you can feed it crops and complete quests, rewarding limited seed packs sometimes
New mushroom, venus flytrap, lotus, eggplant, durian, cranberry and rainbow seed crops have been added
New snow weather added
New chilled and frozen mutations are added
New trowel, lightning rod, rainbow seed pack, premium seed pack and basic seed pack items are added
Crops and placed gear now save when leaving and rejoining
When harvesting crops, you now have a chance to get an extra seed
Mobile haptic touch added when collecting crops
Tooltips added, you can hover over the hotbar for more info
Daffodil, rasberry and pineapple seeds are buffed
Grapes are no longer hard to harvest when large
